xmlText.p: BALTIMORE ORIOLES — Named Adam Esselman coordinator of baseball information.
CHICAGO WHITE SOX — Named Dave Duncan pitching consultant. Agreed to terms with LHP Xavier Cedeno, INF Jake Elmore and RHPs Jeanmar Gomez and Bruce Rondon on minor league contracts.
CLEVELAND INDIANS — Agreed to terms with RHP Stephen Fife on a minor league contract.

MIAMI MARLINS — Agreed to terms with RHPs Tyler Cloyd, Jumbo Diaz, Javy Guerra, Drew Rucinski, Jacob Turner, and Alex Wimmers; LHP Mike Kickham; C Bryan Holaday; INFs Cristhian Adames, Johnny Giavotella, Yadiel Rivera, and Jonathan Rodriguez, and OFs Rafael Ortega, JB Shuck, and Scott Van Slyke on minor league contracts.
NEW YORK METS — Renewed their player development contract with Columbia (SAL) through the 2020 season.
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed LHP Andrew Barbosa.
CHICAGO BULLS — Acquired C Willie Reed and the right to swap 2022 second-round draft picks from Detroit for G Jameer Nelson and them waived Reed.
CLEVELAND CAVALIERS — Acquired G Jordan Clarkson and F Larry Nance Jr. from the Los Angeles Lakers for G Isaiah Thomas, F Channing Frye and a 2018 protected first-round draft pick.
ATLANTA DREAM — Signed F Angel McCoughtry to a multiyear contract.
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Placed Fs Marcus Kruger and Josh Jooris on waivers.
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Recalled F Jimmy Hayes from his conditioning loan to Binghamton (AHL). Acquired Fs Christoph Bertschy and Mario Lucia from Minnesota for D Viktor Loov.
NEW YORK RANGERS — Recalled D Neal Pionk from Hartford (AHL).
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Signed D Desmond Bergin to a PTO agreement.
READING ROYALS — Announced Fs Alex Krushelnyski and Steven Swavely have been recalled to Lehigh Valley (AHL).
SPORTING KANSAS CITY — Traded G Andrew Dykstra to Colorado for a 2020 second-round draft pick.
JACKSONVILLE ARMADA FC — Loaned MF Jack Blake to Tampa Bay (USL).
USL — Named Brad Baker vice president of broadcasting, effective Feb. 13.
OTTAWA FURY FC — Signed MF Cristian Portilla and D Kyle Porter.
METRO ATLANTIC ATHLETIC CONFERENCE_Named Joe Ruggiero director of new media/video.
ALBANY (NY) — Signed football coach Greg Gattuso to a five-year contract extension through the 2022 season.
EASTERN MICHIGAN — Named Ben Needham assistant football coach.
IOWA — Named Kammy Powell football athletic trainer.
